lines.text: Help is coming! Why, it's General Custer. Can he save them?
[General Custer is shot off his horse]
Evidently not. And who is this? Why, it's Daniel Boone. What can he do?
[Daniel Boone is shot off his horse]
Nothing. Stonewall Jackson! Good old Stonewall. Here he comes!
[Stonewall Jackson is shot off his horse]
There he goes. Ah ha! Buffalo Bill, the great Indian fighter.
[Buffalo Bill is shot off his horse]
And so, my friends, law and order was established in the West, thanks to Mighty Mouse!
